title.native: シャングリラ・フロンティア

description:
"When was the last time I played a game that wasn't crap?" This is a world in the near future where games that use display screens are classified as retro. Anything that can't keep up with state-of-the-art VR technology is called a "crap game," and you see a large number of crap games coming out. Those who devote their lives to clearing these games are called "crap-game hunters," and Rakuro Hizutome is one of them. The game he's chosen to tackle next is Shangri-La Frontier, a "god-tier game" that has a total of thirty million players. Online friends... An expansive world... Encounters with rivals... These are changing Rakuro and all the other players' fates! The best game adventure tale by the strongest "crap game" player begins now!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: シャングリラ・フロンティア〜クソゲーハンター, 神ゲーに挑まんとす〜
Shangri-La Frontier: Kusoge Hunter, Kami ge ni Idoman to su
SHANGRI-LA FRONTIER ～เมื่อนักล่าเกมขยะท้าสู้ในเกมเทพ～
Thợ săn Game rác thách thức Game cấp Thánh

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: Virtual World
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the world inside a video game.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Primarily Animal Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed animal or animal-like characters.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: POV
tags.description: Point of View; features scenes shown from the perspective of the series protagonist.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Dullahan
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a Dullahan, a creature from Irish Folklore with a head that can be detached from its main body.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

[Website](https://monaca.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MONACA_jp)

__MONACA__ is a Japanese music production studio, which was established by the composer Keiichi Okabe in October 2004.

__Members__:
• [Keiichi Okabe](https://anilist.co/staff/121585/Keiichi-Okabe) (CEO)
• [Satoru Kousaki](https://anilist.co/staff/101555/Satoru-Kousaki)
• [Ryuuichi Takada](https://anilist.co/staff/109459/Ryuuichi-Takada)
• [Kakeru Ishihama](https://anilist.co/staff/150946/Kakeru-Ishihama)
• [Hidekazu Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/141852/Hidekazu-Tanaka)
• [Keiichi Hirokawa](https://anilist.co/staff/156490/Keiichi-Hirokawa)
• [Kuniyuki Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/154774/Kuniyuki-Takahashi)
• [Shuotarou Seo](https://anilist.co/staff/317330/Shoutarou-Seo)
• [Oliver Good](https://anilist.co/staff/317296)
• [Keita Inoue](https://anilist.co/staff/229376/Keita-Inoue)

__Past Members__:
• [Yuri Mitsumi](https://anilist.co/staff/201236/Yuri-Misumi)
• [Keigo Hoashi](https://anilist.co/staff/111233/Keigo-Hoashi)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/917065612148346882)

Composite artist affiliated with Asahi Production.
_Note: Not to be confused with [横山由季](https://anilist.co/staff/164104/Yuki-Yokoyama)._
